sub_title: Marketing&communication, SDG Management research, Reporter (Africa Knows), Customer Representative (English/French),
summary:
Resilient, result-oriented professional with 10+ years of exceptional experiences in SDG management research, reporting, project monitoring and evaluation, data collection/entry/analysis; computer knowledge (MS Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Nutshell). Succinct in journalism and teaching skills. Impressive community sensitisation, awareness and project training abilities with strong expertise in communication (English and French) and laudable aptitude to adapt to evolving programme, industry and organisation trends. Well-demonstrated problem-solving and analytical thinking skills. Versatile professional with adequate skill-set to excel in leadership role to enhance an an organisation’s/company’s ability to attain its goals. This interview with the Dutch Immigration Office (IND) ahead of their 25th anniversary gives a glimpse of my aptitude https://youtu.be/K2kGqH1WSyw. 
https://www.universiteitleiden.nl/en/news/2017/11/you-give-the-city-an-international-flavour
